long_description: An efficient all-purpose paddle designed for recreational paddling on inflatable boats, the Aquaglide Kayak Paddle breaks down into 4 pieces for easy transportation to and from the water. Powder-coated aluminum shaft offers superior strength and light weight. Durable injection-molded blades deliver smooth, efficient power. Features convenient handgrips and drip guards.
short_description: An efficient all-purpose paddle designed for recreational paddling on inflatable boats, the Aquaglide Kayak Paddle breaks down into 4 pieces for easy transportation to and from the water.
